<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="user" pm:assignedUsers="1" pm:assignedGroups="" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":71,"completed_action":"URL","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":"https:\/\/www.ecosia.org","enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}}}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_2" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_13</bpmn:incoming>

    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="Task 2" pm:screenRef="71" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_13</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:parallelGateway id="node_7" name="Parallel" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>

    <bpmn:task id="node_14" name="Terminate Task" pm:screenRef="71" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">

    <bpmn:task id="node_19" name="Task 1" pm:screenRef="71" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">

    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_8hhh" name="Terminate End">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_6</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:terminateEventDefinition/>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_6" name="" sourceRef="node_14" targetRef="node_8hhh"/>
